post.desc:
Come to think of it, what is Marisa's specialty? Is she really a generalist and/or still too novice to reach that point? Alice's is obviously puppeteering. Patchouli's seems to be oriental elements. Byakuren's seems to be light. Narumi's seems to be... stone and fire (furnace?).

Hmm... Marisa seems to be very similar to Byakuren here on the magic side. Light and stars. ðŸ¤” Now I understand why Zounose made the doujin pairing the two together.

And the second one seems to be a [**line**](https://x.com/ha43zu/status/1251749903484608514) from a Japanese drama series.
